body.name: Magnetic Mini Tripod Mount for Magsafe iPhone 15/14/13/12 Series,Flexible Phone Tripod Stand for Video Recording, Vlogging, Selfie, Travel Photography
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 16 hrs 14 mins
features: Package Included: 1x magnet base, 1x bendable tripod, 2x iron ring

Easy 360° rotation without a clip,providing the convenience of vertical, horizontal, and high-angle modes for your phone without the need to remove it. The super strong magnet design uses 24 N54 magnetic cores(usually only 12 N52 on the market), with maximum vertical adsorption force of 8kg on the front, which can securely secure your phone.
Compatible with all smartphones, it can directly adsorb phones with MagSafe, such as iPhone 15, 14, 13, and 12 series, and comes with an iron ring for other phones without magnetic suction function.

Flexible tripod with bendable legs can around objects. The tripod material is upgraded. The legs are made of high quality metal and connected with metal, strengthening the rubber coating and foam protective layer. Enhanced anti slip rubber feet, this design ensures maximum stability of the desktop and floor.

Lightweight & Portable, 12.6" (32cm) in length and 6.7 ounce(190g) in weight. The tripod can be used as a tripod or selfie stick, can wrap on lampposts, fence posts, tree limbs, chairs, doorknobs, etc.

What you see is what you get - we promise that all photos and videos are real product photos, so you can feel the real texture and get the product in the advertisement. If any components are damaged or you are not satisfied with this product, please feel free to contact us and you will receive a 100% full refund or replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magnetic Mount and Flexible? Score!
reviews.reviewText: I have a couple of small desktop tripods that were O.K., but didn't like that I always had to use one of those plastic mounts that you had to pull out the arms to attach your phone. Some of them barely opened far enough to accommodate my iPhone with its case on (it makes me a little nervous not having my case on my phone when it's on a mount like that).That's exactly why I got this Magnetic Mini Tripod Mount for Magsafe iPhone. My iPhone attaches via a MagSafe mount and boy does it do that great. The magnetic is strong AND I get to keep my case on. For those that don't have a MagSafe case, they include the magnetic rings which is a nice add. It also comes with a regular tripod mount to for DSLR camera of video cameras.The ball joint is great and allows for 360 degree rotation and is super light. The flexible legs are a lifesaver and know I'm going to be able to get those shots I was never able to get with my other non-fleixible tripods.Compact and very portable, this tripod is a win all the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not my favorite. Kinda flimsy. Falls over easily. Does not hold my iPhone 14 pro well. I had to find a new tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Ok, but a little unstable
reviews.reviewText: I do like the flexible arm to attach this to a surface, but when you stand it up and attach a phone, it is a little top-heavy and can fall over. The magnet is strong enough to hold my iPhone 14Pro, so once I adjust the lags to a steady position, it works fine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This tripod enables a wide range of lower-height options. Great when trying to get the right angle and height when setting on top of another hard surface like a table or countertop. The legs are a Gumby-type moldable material so you can pretty much bend them wherever needed to get the exact height and angle needed. While the tripod has a standard camera screw mount, it also includes a magnetic mount for iPhones and others when using a compatible case or by attaching one of the included metal rings to any device that will be mounted. Overall, the flexibility makes this a really valuable piece to have handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The magnet is a plus
reviews.reviewText: I have been looking for a cell phone stand for my phone for a while in order to take videos and pictures. When I saw this, I knew it be great due to the simple fact that it is magnetized for a MagSafe. I have the new iPhone, and a MagSafe case, which works great with us.The package also comes with metal rings you can put on your phone if your phone does not have the MagSafe metal magnet ring. This thing holds my phone upright and could be tightened and loosened to create the perfect scene. I have no issues with this and will be using it for mini live stream going forward.
